short_summary: 1 x ARC WELDING TRUCK AND ILS DELIVERABLES
description: THE DEPARTMENT OF NATIONAL DEFENSE HAS A REQUIREMENT TO PROCURE Qty 1 x ARC WELDING TRUCK AND ILS DELIVERABLES FOR DELIVERY TO CANADIAN FORCES BASE (CFB), EDMONTON THE REQUESTED DELIVERY DATE IS 120 DAYS AFTER CONTRACT AWARD.
full_summary:
================
### ARC Welding Truck Tender: W8476-226569/C

#### Tender Overview

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites bids for the procurement of one (1) Arc Welding Truck and its associated ILS deliverables. The requested delivery location is Canadian Forces Base Edmonton. The delivery date is expected to be 120 days after contract award.

#### Tender Documents

The tender solicitation includes the original bid solicitation number W8476-226569/C and amendments 1 to 4. The documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. The relevant documents are available for download at [CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub).

### Supplier Information

*	[Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)](#)
*	[Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement](#)
*	[Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement](#)
*	[Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)](#)
*	[Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement](#)
*	[Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)](#)

### Contact Information

* **Name:** Genevieve Roach
* **Email:** [genevieve.roach@forces.gc.ca](mailto:genevieve.roach@forces.gc.ca)
* **Address:** Department of National Defence, 101 Colonel Byron Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1A0K2

### Bid deadline

The tender closing date and time is April 14, 2023, at 2:00pm (EDT). The tender is listed as expired, but related documents are available for download.
